title: Select All Employees
description: Write a query to select all columns from the employees table.

title: Count All Customers
description: Write a query to count the total number of customers.
solution: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM customers;

title: List Unique Product Categories
description: Write a query to find all unique product categories.
hint: Use DISTINCT to get unique values
solution: SELECT DISTINCT category FROM products ORDER BY category;

title: Employees with High Salaries
description: Write a query to find all employees with a salary greater than 80000.
hint: Use WHERE clause to filter rows
solution: SELECT first_name, last_name, salary FROM employees WHERE salary > 80000 ORDER BY salary DESC;

title: Products Sorted by Price
description: Write a query to list all products ordered by price from highest to lowest.
solution: SELECT name, price, category FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;

title: Recent Orders
description: Write a query to find the 5 most recent orders.
solution: SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 5;

title: Employees in Engineering
description: Write a query to find all employees in the Engineering department (department_id = 1).
solution: SELECT first_name, last_name, salary FROM employees WHERE department_id = 1 ORDER BY last_name;

title: Average Product Price
description: Write a query to calculate the average price of all products.
solution: SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price FROM products;

title: Orders in Pending Status
description: Write a query to find all orders with status 'pending'.
solution: SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY order_date;

title: Customers from USA
description: Write a query to find all customers from the USA.
solution: SELECT name, email, country FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY name;
